channel.title: Hyperion Charity Project [Website online!]
channel.description:
[center][b]Charity based community project![/b][/center] [center][img]http://i53.tinypic.com/308gopw.png[/img] [/center] [center][size=18pt]Show us your support and comment! [url=http://www.gamerdestiny.co.uk]Click here for the website![/url][/size][/center] Please note we are still in development of both site and server! [center][b]Contact information![/b] [b]Urgent![/b][/center] [center][b]Please add my MSN, saphire-gv@hotmail.co.uk[/b][/center] [b]Information[/b] This project will be based entirely on the community, total earnings at the end of month will be put into charity (excluding costs of VPS when hosted). The server will be built of Rs2DV or Hyperion and will specify features that you guys want, suggestions are needed and also a good development team for both website and server. [b]Currently donated[/b] [Currently donated [b]130.8080 USD[/b]] [b]Development[/b] The development started on 22/03/2011 and much has been done since! Here's a list of what has been created. (Blank hyperion) [ul][li]Player loading[/li] [li]Player Saving[/li] [li]Friend list[/li] [li]Ignore list[/li] [li]Basic clan chat[/li] [li]Running with player energy[/li] [li]Item equipment [/li] [li]Use item on objects[/li] [li]Banking[/li] [li]Private messaging[/li] [li]Report abuse[/li] [li]Npc loading[/li] [li]"Climb over" features[/li] [li]Player combat[/li] [li]Player vs npc combat[/li] [li]Magic teleports[/li] [li]Prayer draining[/li] [li]Basic spells[/li] [li]Range with correct animations and timers[/li] [li]Item bonuses[/li] [li]Woodcutting base (Loads from python script)[/li] [li]Mining base (Loads from python script)[/li] [li]Cooking base (Loads from python script)[/li] [li]Started on smithing base (Loads from python script)[/li][/ul] [b]Project list[/b] Due to my account cancellation on my webhost, I have joined with e+ and started the development of a new site. You can view the site by clicking the link at the top of this post. The project list is ow on this topic and will remain on this topic. This could potentially be the biggest project moparscape has ever seen! [b]We are currently looking for:[/b] [i]Server Developer[/i] [ul][li]Saphire`[/li] [li][i]Empty[/i][/li] [li][i]Empty[/i][/li][/ul] The [b]server developers[/b] roll in this project is to make the most effort they can, we won't be accepting anyone or everyone as we need people with good experience in Java and Rs2protocols. When applying please provide proof of past experience and I will review yourself and ask a few questions on what we would want from you! [i]Web Developer[/i] [ul][li][i]B2300 T4nk[/i][/li] [li][i]Empty[/i][/li][/ul] The [b]web developer[/b] has a specific roll in this, possibly one of the most needed rolls of this server, without a clean, tidy and user friendly website this project will just fail and I really wouldn't want that, the design of the website will be discussed by all the development team members before starting, although the web designer will have the final say. [i]Graphical designer[/i] [ul][li][i]Squirt LTD (Glenn)[/i][/li] [li][i]Empty[/i][/li][/ul] The [b]Graphical designer[/b] will be needed on helping both the server and website, any logo's needed for the website will be passed down to the graphic designer, again the logo's will be discussed by the final development team members but final say will be down to you! [i]Movie editor[/i] [ul][li][i]Squirt LTD (Glenn)[/i][/li] [li][i]Empty[/i][/li][/ul] The [b]movie editor[/b] will have a huge roll in this community, making fancy videos will increase the servers popularity and attract more members. [b]What charity?[/b] The charity is decided by our members, each month there will be a poll asking what charity you would like to donate the money too, at the end of each month the charity with the highest votes receives the full donation. Hopefully I can get staff members of Moparscape and Moparisthebest in this project as it is a community project and is based on all moparscape members. [b]Application[/b]
Name: Position: Experience: E-Mail address:
[i]I would like to thank anyone who contributes to this project, giving something to charity even small amounts of money is a highly respected thing.[/i] [b]Server pictures[/b] [i]The Dedicated Host[/i] This is a picture of the dedicated hosting I will be using for the server. [img]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb444/saphire-gv/vps.png[/img] [b]Project members list[/b] [i]NOTE: This list doesn't mean you will be on our development team, your just a member of this project.[/i] Newty Rash Squirt Ltd Clawz Fury B2300 T4nk jmood128 Uncalled Wintercanon Fuse RunePro Tom_BETA Project Epic X Entinity X casey. asshole_rule Scape-JAVA glestrts

item.title: Hyperion Charity Project [Website online!]
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Davidi2:

We’re redoing a lot of the stickies at the moment, and for this section we’re not gunna sticky anything unless it is relevant to everyone, sorry. And this hasn’t made much progress since the last time I looked…

Okay I understand, the development has stopped for the time being anyway. Due to life issues that some people may understand on this forum, oh and for the bill I received from my web host back last week.

I should be able to get started next week on the server, many features are added so I don’t see why I can’t host it soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Charity Project [Website online!]
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Progress is going slow I’m sorry to say, I do work for about half an hour daily but at the moment I’m just fixing up some bugs I managed to find when I was messing around the other day. I am planning to post pictures of the progress but I haven’t had the time yet due to work related matters. Hopefully by the weekend I will give a big update on the original thread along with pictures and a lot more information about this development.

I am also working on the website, due to my webhost cancelling my payment I’ve had to run it through localhost so sorry for any inconvenience caused with the charity projects community.

We are in need of server and web related developers, so please sign up and we can proceed further from there.

Read full topic

If it’s in america, people can get their own jobs that requires no college education (such as fast food places, green houses, and any other jobs that kids can get…). Anyway, I wish you luck if your going to actually give it to charity. I might donate to it when I get my server up.

item.title: Hyperion Charity Project [Website online!]
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

`SJ_:

I’ll talk to `Alec and ask him if you can use the VPS we have for Triton.

That would be very handy, thanks!

Just a quick update: I was planning to get the server online for a few of you to check it out, unfortunately I’m having problems with the client so I’m unable to get it online today, I’m working my best to get everything in order by this weekend but I need a hand with website, graphics and possibly the client. If anyone is interested drop me a private message and I will get back to you asap.

Update: Website is up and running.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Charity Project [Website online!]
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“ForumDeveloper, post:121, topic:386559”]Name: Jamie

Position: Forum Developer

Experience: http://www.pk-world.com/

E-Mail address: ForumDeveloper@live.co.uk

I am a vBulletin user, and will probably not work for you if you are using any other forum software. If you are using SMF then I may still consider it, however I will have to start learning that, and it may take me a week or two to have some advanced knowledge.[/quote]

We don’t hire forum developers, sorry.

EDIT: We are planning too release a simple server just to get the community rolling, this server is still in development and will be for a few more weeks/months! This base will be switched with the current one when we have finished everything and I’m happy with the development.

Note: Please keep us alive, support is key in this project.

[s]Note 2: We moved the project to emulousplus, I worked very hard on making different features for the site and crated a fully working site integrated with the SMF forum. The web master “micah” decided to take control over the forum and persuade Classic_ that I changed the control panel password and deleted all the files from each domain that was hosted there. I now have no website domain and due to no donations will not be able to carry on with this project.

I am still working on the server, 'till I find someone who will let me use their host or even give me a web host to use. emulousplus was just a mistake, hopefully I can carry on with this project somewhere else!

If you need more information please contact me via private message, I hope Classic_ understands that I did not do anything to emulousplus, in fact I only helped it.[/s]

Note 3: I am working on this project alone, therefore cannot speed up the release date at all, in-fact it is going a lot slower than expected due to life issues popping up. Please note that the development is still active and I have no intentions to scrap this project.

We are looking for staff! Don’t hold up!

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Charity Project [Website online!]
item.dc:creator: @Burning_fangs Burning fangs
item.description:
@Burning_fangs wrote:

Name: Wolf (burning fangs on here i guess)

Position: Server Developement

Experience: no released experience due to never having been able to get someone to host my server, but i’ve sort of been creating a server on and off for the past 4 months. things I’m proud of on my server: creating my custom boss and area & creating an “aura” effect.
If you’d like to interview me to gauge my experience feel free. I’d also be willing to have a look at a sample of code (not sure how Hyperion is formatted) and creating something which you tell me to.

E-Mail address: wolf@rsps-coder.co.cc
